cons: Not the best pay for workload

job_title: Certified Medical Assistant in Camden, NJ
pros: You do get a lot of medical experience here
cons:
The pay is terrible for the amount of patients seen everyday
The system constantly shuts down
Raises are never given when they are supposed to be

review_title: horrible pay and force work after hours without compensation.
pros: free health care that is all
cons: The have a patient  quota of 30 patients a day. The working hours are 8:00am to 4:30 pm and lunch(you do not get paid for lunch) is one hour no paid  breaks. Problem is that they force you to work through lunch and after closing time with no pay for either (.In other words you are not compensated for overtime) They will tell you that you get free health care and you should be happy with that. You have no time to clean up the opertory between patients,and little time to do your instruments, and they allways run out of supplies meaning mask, gloves, intruments and dental materials. Some of the dental assistants work very hard ,while others just do nothing and sit on there butts all day and talk on the phone at the front desk, and when you ask them for help they will tell you no. It is a hostile working enviorment ( the patients are the worst too!!) and Camcare has a high turnover in employment .

pros: Majority great people to work with.
cons: Minority lack people skills, management skills.

pros: no out of pocket healthcare cost
cons: small company no room for advancement
